lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Twins’ outstanding left-hander Francisco Liriano, still feeling pain in his elbow, has stopped his rehabilitation and may consider surgery. Liriano left the team’s facility in Fort Myers, Fla., and was to consult with doctors. He began working out there earlier this month, trying to get healthy enough to pitch in winter ball.
